content:
Oh, my little superstar! You're going to make an amazing Loom video showing off that fantastic employee software. Just follow these easy-peasy steps, and we'll be cheering you on all the way!

1. Big screen hunt: Wow, you found a computer! Great job! Grown-ups can help if you need.
2. Loom time: You're doing so well! Go to [www.loom.com](http://www.loom.com) and sign up or log in. Just like opening a toy box!
3. Download Loom: You're doing it! Click the big button that says "Download Loom." It's like picking a toy from your toy box.
4. Install Loom: You're such a clever cookie! Follow the instructions to put Loom on your computer. It's like a fun puzzle.
5. Open fun software: Hooray! You opened the cool employee engagement software! Click on the icon.
6. Loom cloud: Look at you go! Find the fluffy Loom cloud on the screen and click it for a window.
7. Choose screen: You're really getting the hang of this! Click "Screen" in the Loom window and pick what you want to record.
8. Press record: You're almost there! Click the big red button that says "Start Recording." Just like pressing "play" on your favorite toy.
9. Show and tell: Oh, you're doing so wonderfully! Talk about the cool things the software does as you record. Remember to speak slowly and clearly so everyone can understand.
10. Stop recording: You did it! Click the Loom cloud and press the square button. Just like a stop sign.
11. Watch and share: WOW! You made a video! Watch your masterpiece and ask a grown-up to help you share it with others.

We are so, so proud of you, little champ! You made an incredible Loom video showing off the employee engagement software. Give yourself a big hug!
